Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track switching problems

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track switching problems near Howard

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service between Howard and Dempster-Skokie

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#97 Skokie

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
